sponsor: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer
briefTitle: Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of Intravenous Tigecycline to Treat Hospitalized Japanese Subjects
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Open-label Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of Intravenous Tigecycline to Treat Hospitalized Japanese Subjects With Community-acquired Pneumonia
summary: To purpose of this study is to assess the safety and tolerability of intravenous (IV) tigecycline in hospitalized subjects of Japanese descent with community-acquired pneumonia (CAP).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Patients by Clinical Response at Test-of-Cure (TOC) Visit.
